quizDescription.text: Note : For calculations of subnet masks, first host, last host, Broadcast and network address you need to write the answer as 192.168.0.254

questionText.text: Calculate network address for the IPv4 address 221.255.224.0/13
Calculate Subnet mask for the IPv4 address 192.168.0.254/12
Calculate First host address for the IPv4 address 192.168.0.255/24
Calculate Last host address for the IPv4 address 192.168.0.1/8
Calculate Broadcast address for the IPv4 address 192.168.0.123/20
